name: tiktoklive
author: adminelevation
description: A cog for monitoring TikTok live streams and sending alerts and chat logs to Discord channels.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the TikTokLive cog. Use `[p]tiktokset` to get started.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord server IDs, TikTok messages, and TikTok usernames for the purpose of monitoring live streams. No other personal data is stored.
